h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Get the Sobering Stone for the Yellow-Robed Squire - Method 1
content: The easiest way to get the Sobering Stone is through exploration and waiting until you reach the Yellow Sand Formation. The first place you'll come to is Windrest Bridge, which will take you up to Windrest Hamlet.
